dict.string: Students and company representatives will check-in and receive all necessary paperwork and gifts.
Lobby, The Inn at Virginia Tech
Students and other attendees from all schools and companies are invited to socialize in the ballroom of The Inn at Virginia Tech.
Atrium Outside of Latham Ballroom, The Inn at Virginia Tech
An event will be carried out to get students acclimated to each other and encourage networking.
Atrium Outside of Latham Ballroom, The Inn at Virginia Tech
A meal will be catered by The Inn at Virginia Tech and will last about an hour.
Latham A,B,C, The Inn at Virginia Tech
An hour block is set aside for a speaker to introduce students to the conference and set the tone for the weekend.
Latham A,B,C, The Inn at Virginia Tech
A meal will be catered by The Inn at Virginia Tech and will last about an hour.
Students are invited to submit and present their IE-related research papers.

Break-Out Sessions will commence and be carried out according to the student’s preferences. Panels of company representatives, IE alumni, and other post-graduates will gather to speak about IE as a profession, graduate school, and post-graduate life. Six Sigma information session about its meaning and the steps necessary to acquiring certifications

Break-Out Sessions will commence and be carried out according to the student’s preferences. Panels of company representatives, IE alumni, and other post-graduates will gather to speak about IE as a profession, graduate school, and post-graduate life. Six Sigma information session about its meaning and the steps necessary to acquiring certifications

Sponsors will be assigned a table or two at which company representatives will be stationed to talk to students in incremental time periods. This event is meant to act as a casual career fair for companies to assess the students that they have deemed interesting either from previous encounters or analysis of the resume book provided.
Placeholder text blah blah blah description will be inserted here.
Sponsor will have the choice of event for the team building event and will have strategic marketing opportunities during the event.
Solitude, The Inn at Virginia Tech
Overview presentation of IIE presented by Joe Wilck.
Owens Banquet Hall, Virginia Tech Campus
A meal will be catered by the Inn at Virginia Tech and will last about an hour.
Owens Banquet Hall, Virginia Tech Campus
An hour block is set aside for a speaker to review the days events and present information about their experiences that are relevant to Industrial Engineering.
Owens Banquet Hall, Virginia Tech Campus
Awards for the Technical Paper Competition and other IIE honors will be given out by the keynote speaker and others.
Owens Banquet Hall, Virginia Tech Campus
A meal will be catered by the Inn at Virginia Tech and will last about an hour.
The Atrium outside of Latham Ballroom, The Inn at Virginia Tech
The plant tour will expose students to real life implementation of industrial and systems engineering.
Virginia Tech Transportation Institute, Blacksburg VA
